snippet: A bizarre but seemingly legal idea to get around the country’s debt ceiling using a trillion-dollar coin is having its day in Washington.
abstract: Bizarre but seemingly legal idea to get around the country’s debt ceiling using trillion-dollar coin is having its day in Washington; proposal, which originated in economics and business blogs and has remote chance of happening, has won ample attention and garnered new controversy as Republicans and White House seem to be headed for another standoff over debt limit.
lead_paragraph: A bizarre but seemingly legal idea to get around the country’s debt ceiling using a trillion-dollar coin is having its day in Washington.
